cells.data:
use one of these HTML cases, or let Robert know if you need another special case

/*fix for fixed-header*/
div.section h1, div.section h2, div.subsection h3, li.resourceHeaderCell {
  padding-top: 120px;
  margin-top: -80px;
} 

make sure this stylesheet is included
<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="/en/styles/bcls-doc-site.css">
